comments.body: Can we please add a note to include a license file once we can? A link to issue ( https://github.com/miguelgrinberg/Flask-HTTPAuth/issues/45 ), would also be good.
I'll add this issue to the main feedstock once it gets merged out of staging.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@about:
  home: http://github.com/miguelgrinberg/flask-httpauth/
  license: MIT
  summary: 'Basic and Digest HTTP authentication for Flask routes'
  dev_url: http://github.com/miguelgrinberg/flask-httpauth/
